name: Mission Cassini VII
description:
A game made for the Super Casual Game Jam 2.  The jam was used as an opportunity to figure out vehicle mechanics, procedural terrain, and lighting in the Godot engine.  The web-build of the game cannot run a procedural terrain but I have it working in a standalone build.  There isn't anything to do in the game expect drive around.  

MOVE: W A S D
RESET: R
QUIT: Escape

By: Roger || PROJECTaroid
July 21-22, 2022
